DOC.brief_summary: This study aim investigate effect enteral feeding 's macronutrient composition inflammatory mediator , oxidative stress outcomes Intensive Care Unit ( ICU ) patient acute respiratory failure . In double-blind randomized control trial , 42 patient sex diagnose acute respiratory failure ICU receive enteral feeding , randomly assign three group 14 . First Intervention group ; high-protein low-carbohydrate diet high olive oil , second intervention group ; high-protein low-carbohydrate diet high sunflower oil control ; high-protein kitchen formula . Intravenous level uric acid , high sensitive C-Reactive Protein ( hs-CRP ) , Interleukin 6 ( IL-6 ) Total Antioxidant Capacity ( TAC ) measure day 0 10 . As well , organ failure , duration ventilation , length ICU stay mortality rate evaluate .
DOC.brief_title: Enteral Feeding Composition Acute Respiratory Failure
DOC.criteria: enrol ICU age old 18 year old need mechanically ventilation enteral feed previous diabetes previous HIV infection previous nervous system previous liver failure previous nephrotic syndrome pass 48 hour diagnose acute respiratory failure death less three day enteral feeding administration extubation less three day enteral feeding administration
